name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"9636dd06-1c8d-4a32-9c0b-d4c32f228f91","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: do_assign","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"07911d57-1448-464f-8b0b-c0332eec2186","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"do_assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is the tactical dispatcher for assignment logic. While ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_visit_assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" oversees the whole operation, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"do_assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" deals with the nitty-gritty of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"matching","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" data to targets. It handles the structural complexity of Python assignments, including simple naming, tuple unpacking (destructuring), attribute setting, and list/dictionary index modification.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a9e04f59-ebbd-44d4-aae8-fb4c57aa998c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Python assignments are flexible. You can write ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"a = 1","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x, y = get_coords()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"data['key'] = value","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"obj.prop = 5","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". A single rigid logic cannot handle all these cases. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"do_assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" recursively breaks down complex structures until it isolates the fundamental operation (e.g., "put value V into variable N"), ensuring the analyzer correctly models data flow regardless of syntax.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7aec82d5-d3ce-44f7-92e7-5c8114225b61","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"35aa7111-4bdd-4283-9fc3-f7d145abce03","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Tuple Unpacking (Destructuring):","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"f4eae59f-ce1f-49b4-82f1-0c6fb16efc43","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the target is a Tuple (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x, y","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x, y = (1, 2)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it iterates through both the target elements and the decoded values list.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dc6c05b3-e30b-4a8d-a656-e37cd185346e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It recursively calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"do_assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for each pair. This correctly maps ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"1","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"2","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"y","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"bee76180-0481-4831-b512-48bdc04c4f18","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Simple Names (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"variable = ...","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"6e623173-04a9-4e09-9c26-39bb58c37568","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the target is a Name, it checks the current context (Function vs. If/Else block).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8c5008cd-e887-4234-9cce-c589cb25b2ec","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If inside a conditional block (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"IF_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it ensures a local definition exists to capture the temporary state change before calling ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3e9be396-34c2-4a6c-9975-3a9553fb14cf","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Otherwise, it calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"assign","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" directly to update the variable permanently.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"019ae467-fc97-430c-a636-a4994bdded21","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"obj.attr = ...","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"04e7c994-c057-4967-9f09-e8c709c5d7ea","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It delegates to the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"store","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" helper function, identifying the base object (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"target.value","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") and the attribute name (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"target.attr","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"edb9e586-0943-4a20-928f-c4473f171ab4","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Subscripts handles assigning to Lists or Dictionaries.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0eccc178-e1c9-4ff2-9bca-c581af746a58","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It resolves the container (the list/map itself).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b31b554d-62c8-4371-9fe3-fba20bfc61a0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It resolves the "slice" or "key" (the index being accessed).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"47ea46eb-66a1-4182-865a-4b82b941ea99","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It
